content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task, wrapped in the specified output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To maintain and develop positive business relationships with a customer's key logistics personnel:

• Communicate regularly to understand their needs, goals, and pain points
• Be responsive and follow through on commitments to build trust 
• Proactively share relevant information, insights and best practices
• Meet with them in person periodically to strengthen the relationship
• Look for ways to add value and improve their logistics operations
• Invite them to industry events and introduce them to others in your network
• Recognize important milestones and accomplishments on their part
• Maintain a friendly, professional demeanor in all interactions
• Solicit their feedback and act on it to continuously improve 
• Position yourself as a logistics expert and trusted partner in their success
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
